Name: huts
About the game: huts is a game about finding & building huts in the woods. Grab different materials from the ground and use your imagination to build your childhood dream hut. Features 20 minutes - 2 hours of gameplay (depending on how much you like building huts) Explore a relaxing forest and build a nice hut Take photos of your creations and they will be visible for other players Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
